trends: There have been no other sightings in Kingston
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming back from a private party in atlanta to my home in rome,ga. i have to take 75 north to highway 41 in carterville then highway 411 to rome. at the party i had no alcohol i was alert no fatigue at all. in between kingston in bartow county and the floyd county i noticed yellow light i want to say it was circular in shape. i was there a few momments and then it accelerated to an amazing speed and disappear. i told my grandmother what i saw and she said people had been calling from cartersville to the local radio station talking of the event the object accleration was amazing. within 3 seconds of its acceleration the object was out of view. i thought the object was helicopter or a plane at first but the acceleration and the object was low in altitude. once it accelerated i knew it couldnt be either or. i felt a since of relief cause i knew it couldnt possibly from this world. i wondered if we were alone. this possibly proved to me we aren't
Summary: Strange yellow light in the sky.
